website_summaries.verdict: Gives you all of the benefits of cacao powder, along with a great taste.
pros: Delivers organic, kosher, vegan, and gluten-free properties, all of which are certified
Gives you a high level of antioxidants
Easy to mix into many different foods and in multiple recipes
Price is about average versus similar products
cons: Products don't have a long shelf life

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: bought "this" product for the nutritional value. 1. It arrived in a totally different packaging 2. It has a printer label of nutrients applied over the top of the actual packaging, which now states no energy, magnesium or antioxidents
customer_reviews.author: 760sunshine

customer_reviews.title: I specifically choose this brand over my normal brand that I use (VIVA NATURALS) because of the Nutritional Facts were better according to what is being advertised
customer_reviews.text: This has false advertising. I specifically choose this brand over my normal brand that I use (VIVA NATURALS) because of the Nutritional Facts were better according to what is being advertised. Then I recieve the product and it has a sticker/label over the Nutritional Facts part of the back of the bag with totally different facts. Why is this? I am very disappointed as I have been mislead. I could of saved by sticking with my usually brand, now I wasted my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Shahiyd

customer_reviews.title: Cacao Powder: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this brand after the Viva Naturals brand was taken off Subscribe and Save. The first bag I received tasted great, the second bag I've just received smells like mildew or something rancid. The flavor is definitely off. I've tried making hot cocoa with it twice now and I've had to dump it out. My husband said it tasted like drinking something fermented or had a weird vinegar-like flavor to it. Their return policy doesn't allow me to return this so I'm dumping it and canceling the subscribe and save subscription and going to just go back to Viva Naturals.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed when opening the bag was a pervasive vinegar smell. Humm; I thought perhaps it wouldn't affect the flavor. Wrong! Also, it clumps when added to coffee. Will not purchase again. Went back to my standby Divine Organics Raw Cacao. Might try to incorporate this stuff into another cacao or cocoa. Nah; into the trash it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Cacao
customer_reviews.text: For a year at least this brand has been superlative. The last time I ordered the products (nibs, ground, and discs) should not have been sold. They smelled bad and were all in clumps. A good sign that they product was not stored properly. I wrote to the company and they were so concerned that they said it would take 24 hrs to address my concerns, but they never answered my notes to them. I tried 3 times and each time they wrote and said so sorry we'll be back to you. They just don't respond and that is worse than selling a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: oaf

customer_reviews.title: Not enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: This cacao is priced right, but I don't like it as well as my previous brand. I have used Navitas for about 4 years. This brand is not as dense. It seems more powdery and processed and the flavor is not as Cacao-y tasting as my previous brand. I make a morning shake using Cacao everyday. I've been using this one for 3 weeks now and have had a headache everyday and minor gastrointestinal upset. I'm not sure if it's because I switched brands or this one just isn't sitting well with me. Navitas always gave me a little energy burst where this brand does not. So maybe it's a caffeine thing. Either way, I won't buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: chellebelle

customer_reviews.title: Rancid product! Fake expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product before and loved it. This time, when I bought it, the bag had been updated, it was an orange color. I received the old packaging with an expiration date of 03/2020. I put it in my cabinet because I still had some left in my previous bag. Well I opened the new bag this week, and it smelled sour. The last bag had a delicious chocolate smell, this one smells disgusting. And it is not returnable. Very unhappy and will not be purchasing from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: PSense

customer_reviews.title: Product Opened/Unable to Return
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Terrasoul Superfoods Organic Cacao, and it was already opened and had leaked out the top and into the packaging. I do not feel it is safe to consume now. I went to return it a moment ago, and apparently it is ineligible for return! Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maturing in Christ

customer_reviews.title: unusable
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the bag today, unfortunately i bought this just over a month ago and the return window is closed. It smells as if it's gone bad. I've purchased this before along with their ceylon cinnamon and it was amazing. I will be throwing this batch in the trash. Huge bummer. Unless i am given a fresh product i will be finding another brand to purchase from in the future. Unusable product. Expiration date says 3/2020 very bummed, i was looking forward to cocoa coffee 😕
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's raw & organic
customer_reviews.text: What more could you want from cacao powder? I mix a tablespoon in my bulletproof coffee, along with cinnamon, maca, butter, monk fruit drops for sugar-free sweetener, and coconut creamer. Pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Smell awful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one instead of my regular brand. It doesn't taste good nor smell good. It has a quite distinctive smell. I tried to return but Amazon says it's not returnable? That is the first time I am having such an experience that I cannot return if I am not fully satisfied - first time ever in US.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: a healthy spoonful
customer_reviews.text: I put a tablespoon in my organic coffee each morning. It turns it into a mocha flavor cup. But all healthy. It is a great way to add that extra nutritious boost to your morning,
customer_reviews.author: tst amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Value, and Taste
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several Terrasoul products and I am always happy with the quality of the product, the value and the packaging. It is a trusted brand and I always go to this company first when selecting my products. The Cocao is just another amazing product of theirs! I will definitely continue to purchase from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Matilde H. Horsley

customer_reviews.title: This has changed
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with this, purchased Oct. 2018. The powder seems like bigger granules than previously. As a result, it does not dissolve as well as it had in the past, even when using the normal "add a little water at a time to make a slurry" method. Also it seems really dry, like during processing it was heated for much longer than previous batches. All in all, the result is much less creamy using either water or milk. I am switching to a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Niles

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent quality. I bought this product in 2017 and really enjoyed the flavour. The recommended one tsp per serving was sufficient to give me the rich cacao flavour that I liked. I bought a second pack in September 2019 and now I have to use almost 5 teaspoons to get near the taste the first pack had. I also had the same experience with the cacao butter that I bought with it. I won't be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: This raw cacao is absolutely delicious and easily works into whatever recipe I add it too. Currently, I'm eating it with millet, maple syrup, cardamom, blueberries, hulled hemp seeds and hemp milk. It's really the best!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Decedant.. Not bitter.. A small bit goes a long way to curbing cravings.
customer_reviews.text: Ohhh my golly! This was at my door when I got home from work. I started Keto and I heard about this on one of the recipe shows. I am impressed. I opened it immediatly smell when I opened was intoxicating i tasted it no sweetener and it wasn't that bitter make you shake taste. I was having the worst chocolate craving i sprinkled 1 teaspoon of this over some carb smart ice cream stirred it in and was in heaven... Definitely will purchase again. And will be rolling my Keto truffles in this for that extra umph!
customer_reviews.author: SAF

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was a great substitute for coffee with just as many ways to prepare it....but. If you are prone to gout be careful. Cacao is very high in purines. In me it triggered a gout episode and I had never had one before. It only took 3 consecutive days of one cup per day, 2-3 tbsp per cup, to set it off. Not a fault of the product it is my body chemistry.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Smooth
customer_reviews.text: It is smooth and delicious. It is in resealable packaging which is nice. The taste is so good. I’m looking to replace my cup of Joe in the AM for this instead because of cacao’s many health benefits. I made it this morning by mixing together first my cold milk with the cacao powder then transferred it to a small sauce pan to heat up. I mixed in a pinch of Himalayan salt, half a cap of pure vanilla extract & a tablespoon of honey. Poured into my mug and topped off with some extra creamy reddi whip. What a treat! I definitely recommend and the price for the amount you get is great.
customer_reviews.author: Privera

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice powder and flavor, I want to try out this brand from my norm, glad i did, like it as much as my other brand I’ve always used before. Much smaller quantity, therefore, a wee bit more per once (&.99). $32.99 for 2.5 lbs. from my supplier, which they were currently out of stock. 😕 Almost forgot to mention... it came in a package with another item I purchased through Amazon, grab out other item and didn’t see it in the box (which I left outside) glad I hadn’t thrown out box!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not A Good Mixer and Not Real Cacao Taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to flavor my vegan protein powder (pea and brown rice blend by Promix). The cacao doesn't mix well at all. I have to use the Vitamix to get it to mix with the soy milk and protein powder. It has an insipid taste, not potent like the cocoa powder I have used in the past. It is also much lighter in color than other cocoa powder. I bought Better Bodies Cocoa and much prefer it to this. My husband has used it in baking and found it acceptable. I bought this once but will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Gerety Hays

customer_reviews.title: Taste is not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: .. I used the recipe of almond milk and sweetener and did not enjoy it like I thought I would. The Keto hot chocolate that I presently use instructs you to use hot water and it is DELICIOUS! If your company has other recipes incorporating your Cacao Drinking Chocolate I would LOVE to see them!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! It’s definitely got a stronger better flavor than the “cocoa powder” I used this to replace, so the chocolate flavor is much more robust when I use it. My only issue is the packaging. I know that this is more environmentally friendly, which I appreciate, but it’s hard to get out a single spoonful without it spilling at least a little. I wound up pouring it from this package into the old cocoa powder container. So it’s slightly mis-labeled, but I’m totally ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Random Oasis

customer_reviews.title: No more!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these products. Ordered and bought many of them for a long time now. Packaging is so similar, I accidentally ordered the wrong item and they refuse to accept a simple return/exchange. That is unacceptable. I’ll find a new company even if I don’t like the product as well. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: My go to Raw Organic Cacao Powder
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor and richness of this raw organic cacao powder. I use this product in everything - smoothies , add to my almond milk, my hot chocolate and in my baking goods - from black bean muffins to chocolate cake to our favorite no bake chocolate oatmeal cookies on the stovetop. I appreciate the quality and have been buying this brand for quite some time. This last bag lasted approximately 3 months. The price is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Wilson

customer_reviews.title: which was very good, but didn't quite capture the flavor I sought ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this(along with the Terrasoul cacao butter) to make my own chocolate. The last batch I made, I used hershey's cocoa powder, which was very good, but didn't quite capture the flavor I sought after in chocolate. This cacao powder gave my chocolate the kind of bitterness you'd find in a traditional dark chocolate. They were absolutely decadent! This is the flavor I seek out in store bought chocolate. I highly recommend this cacao powder if you are a dark chocolate lover!
customer_reviews.author: Cutestoneofall090

customer_reviews.title: JUNK The worst Cacao ever!
customer_reviews.text: I totally agree with previous buyer who wrote "The beans themselves are dry, crumbly, and disgusting smelling. Because it is food, and I opened one before I realized the problems, I am not able return or exchange them. I will not be ordering from this company again." I love cacao, and had many of them, but this one can not be called cacao. Garbage!! DON"T BUY THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast and sealed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast with prime account and when I opened to transfer to storage container, the cocoa smell was amazing. Have not made a new batch of my protein balls but I can only imagine the flavor will be even richer than the smell.
customer_reviews.author: lldeb

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Always top notch quality organic, non-GMO goodness. One you find a good one you go back. This is probably our 7th reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Pure, simple and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make my vegan protein shakes taste chocolate-y when I want. This definitely passes the taste test. It’s fresh and yummy. I’ll never need to buy chocolate milk mixes or cocoa powder with all the additives anymore. This is pure, simple, and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Brand - highly recommend...
customer_reviews.text: I love Terrasoul Superfoods. I have ordered from them several times now. I have been particularly found of their raw organic cacao powder. It's delicious and very fresh. It mixes well and lasts me a very long time, even during ceremonial usage. I am now going to try other products from them. This is a great company and I have been overly satisfied with their products.
customer_reviews.author: courtney love

customer_reviews.title: YET ANOTHER RE-PACKAGER WITH FANCY HYPED MARKETING
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my local chocalatier - from whom I get Callebaut - this simply is a mediocre product. Not impressed with the Cocao Butter either - seems kind of slimy though I am not especially experienced. But this product simply was the definitely a level or two lower than the quality I get for the same price. Admittedly, I am so tired of these re-packagers and their hype....and mediocre products.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this cacao powder for about a year now. Since the first time I tried it, I found it to be excellent, and quite affordable. It is fulfilling and quite satisfying, with a smooth flavor and excellent consistency when prepared in whole milk. I will definitely continue buying it, and recommended to all who want to add an excellent and healthy cacao powder to their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Adarve

customer_reviews.title: Never met a Terrasoul product I didn't like
customer_reviews.text: We've been going through a lot of cacao powder lately, and when I needed to order more, there was no question for me which brand to go with. Terrasoul makes quality products with decent prices.
customer_reviews.author: Su Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? Organic, affordable and delicious! I use this with my unflavored whey protein powder to limit sugars and carbohydrate intake...makes an otherwise unpalatable product taste delicious. Makes wonderful homemade hot cocoa, chocolate yogurt ect...
customer_reviews.author: G Italiano

customer_reviews.title: Great with just water
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this to add to my smoothies, but just tried it with water and it tasted great for me. Wow,, I know I'm not supposed to pour hot water on it, since it kills some of the benefits, but I think I will make my self a hot cacao every once in a while, haha
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: This one will not push potassium blood levels over the edge.
customer_reviews.text: Watch out! I love the cold press cacoa and will not go back to the other but watch out for the potassium content. This one is okay but the last brand was very high in potassium causing a problem with my blood levels which ended up in the dangerous zone. This product did not affect my levels, must be in the different processing method. Same dark flavor, mixes okay and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mills

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff! Recipe below!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great! My favorite thing with this is to mix it up with three bananas, a handful of kale, spinach or collards & some cashew milk. (Might need to add additional sweetener). Best chocolate milkshake in the world!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: My bag came exactly as described. We switched to cacao vs cocoa for the health benefits and I've used in so far mainly in baking and have not noticed any difference in flavor. I like it and would buy it again, although I think this bag will last quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: A&D W

customer_reviews.title: Smooths and Soothes My Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product and I've enjoyed adding a teaspoon or a bit less to my morning coffee to smooth it out. I find it causes the coffee drink to sit more gently with me after a few sips on an empty stomach. I also sense a bit more of an energy boost from this addition. I'm enjoying this and other products from Terrasoul and highly recommend them to others who are looking to break from bad eating habits.
customer_reviews.author: HankieG

customer_reviews.title: Good Flavor, Horrible Bag!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of this product is good however the packaging is horrible! The ziplock that they use DOES NOT work at all so you either have to transfer the product to another container or put it in another bag, either way it’s a pain! I will not buy anything from them again until they fix this as it has happened on multiple products!
customer_reviews.author: Sappycat

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Nutritious!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other cacao from local coops and this one is Delicious ! Fresh ! I add to my morning shakes my picky grandson who like most likes junk food loves it with almond milk strawberries and banana I sneak in protein and a few spinach leaves and he does not taste it with this powder ! I will be buying again . Don’t hesitate just buy it 😊
customer_reviews.author: sherrie Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, great ingredients, mixes well
customer_reviews.text: This powder is very flavorful, you may not need to use as much as you are used to using with other products. I put a spoonful in my smoothie and it was very coco-ey. I usually buy Trader Joe's brand but the nearest store is in a larger city way too crowded to go to during a pandemic, so I tried this stuff. Now I will prob order this stuff from now on, it's really good :)
customer_reviews.author: OhGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Will be a repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: This is my first raw cacao purchase. I read many reviews and visited many company websites. I purchased the Terrasoul Cacao Powder based on cost, reviews and the company information that I found on their site. Certified organic and harvested from Peru. The powder is superfine and mixes pretty well. The taste is rich and not sweet as expected but the flavor was good enough that I didn't have to add a sweetener. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M.C. from STL

customer_reviews.title: Debris in package?
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to try this product but when I opened it I found some type of plastic debris inside the bag. Checked to make sure it wasn't part of the packaging I removed to open it and I definitely wasn't. Kinda creeped me out to see something that huge make it into the package undetected but I guess it happens. Hopefully a rare occurrence but I was definitely put off by it and won't try my luck with another package...
customer_reviews.author: Angelina A.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite cacao
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cacao and the best price I've found. I use it every morning in my oatmeal and the flavor is so rich and chocolatey. It's cacao so it is not sweet, but it has a very satisfying flavor. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cold Processed Raw Cacao
customer_reviews.text: If you know about cold processed raw cacao, this is the stuff. Be careful. If a product says heat treated AT ALL, it won’t give you what you’re looking for. I’ve already made that mistake. I don’t know about a lot of other products, but I DO know this is the the stuff!
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Crane

customer_reviews.title: This product is good!
customer_reviews.text: Fresh taste, strong flavor and the package is awesome too, this is my 4th time getting products from Terrasoul and I have not complains, give it a try, you would like them! Note that I did spend my money in this product, my review is based on a real experience with the product, I'm not by any means sponsored by them.
customer_reviews.author: Nuurs

customer_reviews.title: It gives you some energy not a whole lot but some and crash afterwards
customer_reviews.text: This powder taste good. I drink it with RSP nutrition chocolate collagen, coconut oil, almond butter, some maca, lucuma, mesquite powder and some almond milk with a banana and ice. The zip tie works good and it’s good for you as well. I drink it every morning. Keeps me full until about lunch time
customer_reviews.author: cesar030

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and great cacao powder
customer_reviews.text: Overall flavor was great (not to strong and not flavorless). Came fresh. I have been using this powder in my smoothies/shakes and it adds good nutritional value and flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Noe

customer_reviews.title: Deep Dark Chocolate Indulgence!
customer_reviews.text: I am a chocolate buff, so I try to buy the best I can afford. This product meets my criteria! I love the flavor of deep dark chocolate when I make smoothies. The powder is very fine, so it blends well in smoothies and in hot chocolate. I will purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kohler Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite cacao powder!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cacao powder because the one I used to get is unavailable on Amazon. I am so glad that I went with this brand. This is as good as the old one in flavor and smoothness, if not better. And the price is lower, so it's a winner for me! Hope this brand will always be available.
customer_reviews.author: Melodious Heart

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to mix cacao in with his morning coffee and my son loves to use it in his smoothies. I normally buy it from Costco but couldn’t find it in store or online so I took a chance here. This is a quality, good tasting product(as long as you like cacao). My husband needs cacao on a daily basis or he feels run down and just generally unwell. We’re happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great raw cocoa
customer_reviews.text: What a great brand. Very dark for dark chocolate lovers like me. My other half likes a little less bitter, so i made chocolates with organic brown rice syrup as the sweetener... turned out fantastic. The chocolates are super creamy given that I used the amazing cocoa butter from this company. They set up nicely and taste divine. Thanks fir another great product.
customer_reviews.author: Love Me Some Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Terrasoul Cacao Powder is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I add a tablespoon of this cacao powder to protein shakes, and it adds a wonderful flavor along with antioxidants. This seller shipped it very quickly, and the product is very fresh. It's also a great price for an organic ingredient, which I've also baked with in place of processed cocoa powder. If you like rich, chocolatey flavor, this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box the powder was all over and there was a little cut in the bottom of the package that I’m sure I did not do when opening the box because I used nothing sharp. The smell of it was amazing and I was so looking forward to it for my smoothies. I didn’t want to take the chance using it. I took my loss and reordered it again. Hopefully the the new package will not be damaged.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOURCE OF ORGANIC VITAMINS
customer_reviews.text: I like natural vitamins that occur in nature. Today's nutrition is deficient, and if we want to stay healthy we must have raw organic cacao powder as one of the principal nutrition sources. Let's pray that Terrasoul might be able to keep doing what's is currently doing.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Gomez Leonardi

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm, but a little expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research before deciding on which brand of Cacao Butter and Powder I wanted to use for my homemade chocolate bars. I pretty satisfied with the product, but it a little pricey(even though its on the low to midrange compared to other brands). Took half a bag to make 2 bars. Other then that, I'm happy with the buy and think this is a good quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lino412

customer_reviews.title: Terrasoul cacao powder
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t opened my bag of terrasoul cacao powder yet, but from my experience with other terrasoul products that I have tried, I will be pleasantly surprised with the good quality of the contents. I haven’t been disappointed yet with the terrasoul products that I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mumishelle

customer_reviews.title: Pungent odor ...Need Item Replaced
customer_reviews.text: I typically love Terrasouls cacao powder. I have ordered before. This last batch had a pungent odor to it and didn’t have the same soothing effects as previous orders. I would like to continue buying from TS... I need someone to reach back to me on a replacement as this item is not eligible for return. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: KAMBE LATTIMORE

customer_reviews.title: Rich and chocolatey
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this cacao powder in her milk. It is very fine powder and dissolves nicely giving a nice texture to the milk. It is very tasty as well. But remember, this is bitter and contains no sugar in it. So you need to add some to your requirement if you would like it to be not bitter.
customer_reviews.author: sriram

customer_reviews.title: I liked how smoothly Navitas Cacao Powder mixed with my coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked how smoothly Navitas Cacao Powder mixed with my coffee compared to Earth Circle Organics Verified Raw Balinese Cacao Powder or Terrasoul Superfoods Organic Cacao Powder. Navitas or OMG! brands have the best flavor for me. The South American cacaos are preferred because of their richer, dark chocolate flavor. The Balinese Cacao tasted more like a Hershey milk chocolate to me; it was lumpier than other cacaos. I'll risk the higher cadmium level of South American cacao for the flavor & smoother mix- no lumps.
customer_reviews.author: L. Spider K.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: First time trying pure Cacao. I was expecting it to be bitter like dark chocolate, but it's not at all bitter. I use it in my smoothie and it tastes just like chocolate milk. No sugar, but very light, yummy chocolate taste. I love it and would recommend it, especially if you are trying to get your kids to drink green smoothies. You can add this to make it kid friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate that's really good for you
customer_reviews.text: This is what chocolate should be. There is no sugar added, and it's not sweet. This is chocolate before all the processing, and it's excellent. I'm on my second bag and will buy more when I finish this bag. I add it to my morning coffee and to smoothies and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: strat_lover

customer_reviews.title: Simply Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrasoul Cacao powder is a staple in my healthy smoothies and protein shakes. The quality and freshness of this product is superior to anything else out there. Great company that also supports worthwhile sustainability efforts like the support of pollinators - Healthy bee populations are critical to a healthy environmental ecosystem that provides the raw foods we need to survive.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate is fine but ...
customer_reviews.text: The bags never, ever, ever re-close. Hope they saved a lot of money by opting for the cheap pkging. They are useless and I have finally had enough. Will not be repurchasing. There are other companies out there with equally decent quality... but the re-closable bags are functional and really come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jay-Jaye

customer_reviews.title: More bang for your buck than in stores
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for smoothies and homemade healthy shakes. The flavor is rich and chocolatey without the sugar. Better priced here than in the stores and it arrives at your door!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Outstandingly misleading labeling; buyer beware;  Caveat Emptor! Terrasoul cacao pwdr cold pressed
customer_reviews.text: Falsely advertised as gluten free and not guaranteed 30 days return. Gluten free is not found on packaging and return link says returns not allowed. Who knows what other information is misleading? Do not risk buying if you have gluten etc. issues!
customer_reviews.author: Ducata

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Cacao
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of this brand. It's very tasty, light, well made, well packaged. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Read Label Carefully
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a great deal and maybe it is ... but we didn’t realize that the nutritional content was so different than that of the Navitas brand (which we usually use). We ordered both from Amazon but on closer inspection we would return this product if that were allowed (it’s not).
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: I Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: great product. I love chocolate and did the mistake of adding too much chocolate for my morning smoothies and it was a good experience. TIP: Just add a little as it a cold pressed and has a lot of flavor. Thanks Terrasoul for this great product. Love the product. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this for one recipe so far. I like to make hot cacao milk. It’s my version of hot chocolate. I use this with cashew or almond milk, cinnamon and maple syrup. It tastes really good and is a nice relaxing warm drink.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W

customer_reviews.title: Smells...'off'
customer_reviews.text: It tastes terrible. I put a spoon of cacao (for nutrient health reasons) along with natural honey and almond milk in my coffee. Switching back to Viva Naturals when this runs out
customer_reviews.author: DJ Alyda

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfying, clean rich flavor
customer_reviews.text: This finely powdered cacao is is rich tasting, satisfying as a hot drink, in coffee or on food. Like all powders, it goes into the mix best if it's stirred up with some liquid before adding the coffee or water to it. I also like the secure, resealable packaging that all Terrasoul good have. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: RoseBlue

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, taste and packaging
customer_reviews.text: Taste great. Cacao is the is the ingredient that gives dark chocolate a good name. Here, you get the cacao (superfood) without having to spend lots of money with dark chocolate. Plus, this Cacao powder taste great. I mixed it with my coffee every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Plinius Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Good taste of chocolate!
customer_reviews.text: .Receoved on time, packaged welp. .Taste is great in my smoothies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula L. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I'm a repeat customer of Terrasoul cacao powder, using it for hot chocolate, brownies and smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: A very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived very quickly and it is absolutely wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was turned on to Terrasoul brand by my granddaughter. I buy the cocoa nibs, pumpkin seeds and other nuts and seeds. It's always great quality and the price is always better than I can find elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Taste great! My only complaint is when you close the bag...cacao dust goes everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Guy C.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for putting - time, care, effort,
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for putting - time, care, effort, - Into sourcing high quality cacao powder. I will continue to purchase from Terrasoul every single time. - Please be true, please be honest, continue to source high quality, don't cheap out, or attempt to save time on the wrong things, and keep it fair trade. Thank you for your service
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this product , I drink it in my coffee , put in smoothies , drink it at night with almond milk and add a little almond butter . A very good price and you only use a little bit so this will last for months , but I will definitely keep buying this for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: I will buy more
customer_reviews.text: The scent is spectacular, I felt in love since I open it. Has a strong chocolate flavor as I like. I have tried with chocolate Bundt and hot chocolate and with sincerity I can say I WILL BUY MORE
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Lara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Cacao Powder
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with my brewed coffee. I keep it refrigerated. Wonderful. Organic cacao powder. Much, much, safer and nutritious than indulging in chocolate bars...they contain so many additives.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Musere

customer_reviews.title: A little more fermented than others...
customer_reviews.text: This has that fermented flavor that some dark chocolates have. It's strong. It's a unique cocoa. A must have for cocoa fans! I mix it with a more mild cocoa and add to my coffee. Mmmm
customer_reviews.author: Joel Frese

customer_reviews.title: Rich flavor for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: While reading the benefits of Cacao powder, I was searching for a reasonable priced product. This product is rich with a great flavor. I have used it in my coffee, muffins, chia pudding and am searching for more! It blends easily in both hot and cold liquids. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Odd, chemical-like smell and taste
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. I have just about finished a bag of cacao powder from another company. I use it every day for health benefits. I wanted to try this brand because of the good ratings and the good price. Unfortunately, when I opened the package this morning, I noticed a odd chemical-like smell. I decided to try it anyway, thinking maybe it was in the packaging, or something. No, the taste was just like the smell. I'm afraid to use it, so now I will have to reorder from another company and I have wasted money I cannot afford to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Tizzie Lish

customer_reviews.title: superfood
customer_reviews.text: i add this to my coffee every morning. delicious and nutritious.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Kellim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product was good and tastes great. Amazon however was a disappointment for me. They packaged it in a bubble envelope and I received a pin tired bag of cocoa. I didn’t get the full package as the powder was covering everything in the envelope. It was usable but a disappointment on there part. I shop Amazon very frequently and this is my first and only problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joni L. Quick

customer_reviews.title: Makes my oatmilk even more yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this several times and have always been pleased with it. I add a heaping tablespoon to my hot oatmilk in the mornings. It is yummy, nutritious, and good for my digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: Lollieme

customer_reviews.title: Love this product and I buy it all the time!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is top notch and the flavor of REAL Cacao is amazing, not to mention the health benefits from it. Well priced and great company (I have bought their other super foods in the past too).
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent taste, texture, purity (re cadmium and lead), diversity (both "Criollo bean" variety and "Trinitario bean" variety), and source (the soil in the Dominican Republic I have read tends to be low in cadmium for cacao bean growing).
customer_reviews.author: ken7on

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Intense and true to life chocolate flavor without the bitterness found in some powdered chocolate and most importantly without the overwhelming sweetness of commercial cocoa powders. I get to dial in exactly the level of sweetness that I like.
customer_reviews.author: Alex N

customer_reviews.title: One bag arrived with a cut (opening) in it
customer_reviews.text: I love this item but one of the two bags I received for my subscribe and save has about a half inch cut in it and cacao was leaking out. I would like a replacement for the one bag.
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Great cocao powder!
customer_reviews.text: This is as good or better than any cocoa powder I've bought...tastes, smells good , rich flavour, and fresh..and a little goes a long way in any recipe, or drink...a nd it is organic!
customer_reviews.author: Philo

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It’s a great addition of flavor to change up my breakfast. The taste is very smooth, not bitter like I was expecting. I can’t wait to use this to bake some healthy snacks. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Work smarter not harder

customer_reviews.title: Raw and organic!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make hot chocolate for my son . It works out great and I am happy that he is drinking clean hot choc with only a little organic sugar.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Terrasoul Superfoods Organic Cacao Powder, 1 Pound
customer_reviews.text: Terrasoul Superfoods Organic Cacao Powder has become my favorite extra ingredient with hot chocolate, coffee & some teas like Chocolate Pu-Ehr, adding healthy antioxidants, without adding sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Joanihr

customer_reviews.title: Very healthy product
customer_reviews.text: I use this in recipe's all the time and found the flavor to be pleasant and the freshness of the product was outstanding. I would certainly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: pie maker

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting cacao.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely presented, delivery on time but what's inside is the good stuff. Great tasting cacao powder, have used it in pudding and gluten free date bars.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

product_meta.title: Terrasoul Superfoods Raw Organic Cacao Powder, 1 Lb - Raw | Keto | Vegan
feature_bullets: Terrasoul Superfoods Raw Organic Cacao Powder, 1 Lb Pouch
Certified Organic, Non-GMO, Earth Kosher, Raw, Keto, Gluten-Free, Vegan
The antioxidants in cacao offer cellular defense against the effects of free radicals, improving the look of skin and promoting cellular repair and rejuvenation.

Terrasoul Superfoods sources the freshest and highest quality superfoods from all over the planet. Our mission is to make these amazing, healthy foods available to you at the lowest prices possible while paying our growers and employees fair wages.
100% Money-Back Satisfaction Guarantee - We stand behind our products and offer a 30-day money back guarantee, backed by an outstanding customer service team.
